thread.title: Derrick Rose rips reports of rift with Jimmy Butler
thread.title_full: Derrick Rose rips reports of rift with Jimmy Butler

author: Steve DelVecchio
title: Derrick Rose rips reports of rift with Jimmy Butler
text:
Derrick Rose rips reports of rift with Jimmy Butler Larry Brown Sports 9 hrs ago Steve DelVecchio © Gregory Shamus/NBAE via Getty Images Derrick Rose insists there are no issues between him and Jimmy Butler. The Chicago Bulls were confident enough in the relationship between Jimmy Butler and Derrick Rose to sign Butler to a max contract over the summer, and Rose insists the team has nothing to worry about.
AdChoices During the postseason last year, reports surfaced indicating Rose became frustrated that Butler was trying to run the offense during a loss to the Cleveland Cavaliers. In a recent interview with CSNChicago.com , Rose reiterated that those rumblings were baseless.
“It’s false,” he said emphatically. “It’s so false. It’s so false. I love Jimmy as a player and as a person for one. Just knowing what he came from, what he had to go through just to get in this position. He still has a bright future. I’m lucky in my career to be playing with a player where the sky’s the limit. Like who knows how good he can be and who knows how good the team can be. It’s very exciting not only be playing with this team but with a guy like that.”
Rose may have gotten upset with Butler during that particular game, but that doesn’t mean couples counseling is needed. Butler essentially said the same thing as Rose back in July, though he wasn’t quite as convincing .
If Rose can remain healthy (and this report should give Bulls fans optimism ), he and Butler should make up the best backcourt in the Eastern Conference.
